name: Wasabi and Shrimp Cheese Ball
author: mkecupcakequeen
summary: A spicy Japanese twist on the traditional cheese ball party appetizer. My friends loved it. Be sure to start moderately with Wasabi and season to taste. Serve with veggies or sesame water crackers.
ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) packages fat-free cream cheese, softened
1 (4 ounce) can sliced water chestnuts, drained and chopped
1 (4.25 ounce) can tiny shrimp, drained and chopped
2 tablespoons wasabi paste, or to taste
directions: In a medium bowl, mix together the cream cheese, soy sauce, water chestnuts, shrimp, and 1 tablespoon of sesame seeds
Gradually stir in wasabi paste until you reach the desired amount of spice
Cover and refrigerate for one hour
Remove the cheese mixture from the refrigerator, and shape into a ball
Roll in the remaining sesame seeds to cover
